title: Puzzlers' Tribute - A Feast for the Mind (gnv64)
description:
Puzzlers' Tribute - A Feast for the Mind
by David Wolfe and Tom Rodgers
A K Peters/CRC Press | December 2001 | ISBN-10: 1568811217 | PDF | 420 pages | 24.4 mb

This second collection of interesting mathematical puzzles continues the tribute to Martin Gardner, who has provided us with original puzzles and puzzling stories ever since he created and produced the "Mathematical Games" column in Scientific American. The international community of puzzle enthusiasts has gathered once again to celebrate Martin Gardner's continued contribution and, most fittingly, has done so in kind, by providing new challenges to our inquiring minds. We proudly present this collection to the mathemagicians of the world for their enjoyment, as a playful provocation.

Brief Contents
Preface	ix
A Playful Tribute (Scott Kim)	xii
In Memorium	xiii
A Greeting to Martin Gardner (Sir Arthur Clarke CBE)	xv
Part I: The Toast Tributes	1
Part II: Tantalizing Appetizers: Challenges for the Reader	35
Part III: Smoked Ham: A Coarse in Magic	73
Part IV: Chefs Caprice	153
Part V: Wild Game (and Puzzles)	207
Part VI: Mathematical Entrees	283
Part VII: Mathematical Treats	349

NOTE: Please use Sumatra or Foxit or Calibre to read this magazine as Adobe reader may cause problems.
